Sentencas: A series of Y0.2ZrxCe0.8-xO1.9 compounds (0 <= x <= 0.6) had been prepared by the modified sol-gel method and characterized by powder X-ray diffraction, thermo-gravimetric analysis, four-probe resistivity, and Vickers's hardness studies.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: The gels from co-precipitation were treated with heated 1-octanol.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: All of the samples showed fluoride structure after calcined at 600 degrees C. Sintering the powders of Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 and Y0.2Zr0.6Ce0.2O1.9 at 1300 degrees C gave the relative density of 95.8% and 99%, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: 99% relative density could be obtained for all samples after sintering at 1500 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: This study showed a much more improved result than that of the previous reports.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: The hardness was 13.7 GPa for the Y0.2Zr0.6Ce0.2O1.9 pellet, which was twice greater than that for Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (7.1 GPa).
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: Therefore, the mechanical properties could be improved by the addition of ZrO2 to Y0.2ZrxCe0.8-xO1.9.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, the electrical conductivity of Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9 and Y0.2Zr0.6 Ce0.2O1.9 were 3.3 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application
Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: The conductivity was decreased by the addition of ZrO2 to Y0.2Ce0.8O1.9.
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application

Sentencas: It showed that the conductivity and hardness of Y0.2Zr0.2Ce0.6O1.9 were 1.2 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Synthesis of Y0.2ZrXCe0.8-XO1.9 Electrolytes From the Sol-Gel Method for Intermediate Temperature URSOFC Application
